Posts.Content: Jun 19, 2013 10:14PM Mariascan wrote: Hi I think i can help, I have been experiencing pain in my left Breast for a few months now, also it is larger and more lumpy than my right. it has been getting more painfull recently so I decided enough is enough went to see my doctor he recommend I had an ultra sound on both breasts. I just got the results an hour ago and it turns out to be fibrodenoma in both breasts but larger in the left. I am quite pleased at the results as it is nothing to serious and he just recommends another ultra sound in 2 months in the mean time he has advised me to stop taking the pill and to use and anti inflammatory when it is painful. I hope this helps.
Posts.Title: Painful fibroadenoma MCurr Mariascan
